description: The OIDC claims supported by Synapse some of which are standardized, https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#StandardClaims

enum.name: iss
enum.description: The OIDC Provider, Synapse

enum.name: sub
enum.description: The user whose identity is shared and whose resources are accessed

enum.name: aud
enum.description: The ID of the OIDC client application

enum.name: iat
enum.description: Issued At timestamp

enum.name: nbf
enum.description: Not Before timestamp

enum.name: exp
enum.description: Expiration timestamp

enum.name: auth_time
enum.description: The timestamp for the event in which the user most recently logged in to Synapse

enum.name: email
enum.description: The user's email address

enum.name: email_verified
enum.description: The user's email address and a synonym for 'email', since the email is always verified

enum.name: given_name
enum.description: The subject's first name

enum.name: family_name
enum.description: The subject's last name

enum.name: company
enum.description: The subject's company/employer

enum.name: team
enum.description: The id(s) of Synapse teams of which the subject is a member, taken from a list of IDs presented by the client

enum.name: userid
enum.description: The immutable principal ID referencing the Synapse user

enum.name: orcid
enum.description: The ORCID linked to the user account

enum.name: is_certified
enum.description: Whether the user is certified.  See https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#certified-users

enum.name: is_validated
enum.description: Whether the user is validated.  See https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#validated-profile

enum.name: validated_given_name
enum.description: The validated first name, if the user is validated.  See https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#validated-profile

enum.name: validated_family_name
enum.description: The validated last name, if the user is validated.  See https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#validated-profile

enum.name: validated_location
enum.description: The validated location, if the user is validated.  See https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#validated-profile

enum.name: validated_email
enum.description: https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#validated-profile

enum.name: validated_company
enum.description: https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#validated-profile

enum.name: validated_orcid
enum.description: https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#validated-profile

enum.name: validated_at
enum.description: The timestamp (seconds since the epoch) when validation occurred.  See https://docs.synapse.org/articles/accounts_certified_users_and_profile_validation.html#validated-profile
